snippet.title: Worms™ 2: Armageddon - Trailer - PlayStation®3, out now to download from PlayStation®Network
snippet.description:
OUT NOW! http://bit.ly/W2APS3 

Worms™2: Armageddon is the latest comic turn-based-strategy blast-a-thon to download for the PlayStation®3 from the PlayStation®Network, and is packed with features set to satisfy both new and older generations of Worms™ players alike.

Featuring an in-depth single-player Campaign Mode, Tutorials and Firing Ranges, there are also multi-player online and offline game modes for up to four players, as well as the ability to create your own game styles and landscapes to use and play with over PlayStation®Network. Incoming with fresh visuals, returning iconic as well as new weaponry, this online and offline destruction-fest is set to grab players across the globe with its unique brand of easy to learn,  but hard to master gameplay.

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent video game developer and publisher responsible for the Worms™ series, Alien Breed and Superfrog. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: http://bit.ly/SubscribeT17.

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/LikeWorms
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
